nodes.text: 2014 Topps Star Wars Chrome Perspectives is a Star Wars Legends Topps trading card set released in 2014. The set's cards are presented from the in-universe perspectives of both the Rebel Alliance and the Galactic Empire.

2014 Topps Star Wars Chrome Perspectives comprises 100 base cards and five insert subsets: Wanted Poster, Empire Priority Target, Rebel Propaganda, Rebel Training Insert, and Empire Propaganda. The 100 base cards also come in Prism Refractor, X-Fractor, Gold Refractor, and SuperFractor parallels. Additional hits include Printing Plates, Autographs, Sketch Cards, and Helmet Medallions.
